lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri's thoughts have already turned to keeping his title-winning squad together next season, with the Italian warning potential suitors they will have to pay over the odds to lure away any of his shining lights.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri Puts Hefty Price Tag on Title-Winning Foxes
headline.main: Ranieri Puts Hefty Price Tag on Title-Winning Foxes

snippet: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri's thoughts have already turned to keeping his title-winning squad together next season, with the Italian warning potential suitors they will have to pay over the odds to lure away any of his shining lights....
